title: Unbreakable Trilogy The Silver Chain The Golden Locket 1-2 epub
description:
The Silver Chain (The Unbreakable Trilogy #1)

Bound by passion, she was powerless to resist.

One dark evening in London, photographer Serena Folkes is indulging her impulsive side with a night-time shoot. But someone is watching her Ã¢â‚¬â€œ mysterious entrepreneur Gustav Levi. Serena doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know it yet, but this handsome stranger will change her life foreverÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

Serena is fascinated by Gustav, the enigmatic owner of the Levi Gallery, and she soon feels an irresistible pull of attraction. The interest is mutual, and Gustav promises to launch SerenaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s photographic career at his gallery, but only if Serena agrees to become his exclusive companion.

To mark their agreement, Gustav gives Serena a bracelet to wear at all times. Attached to it is a silver chain of which he is the keeper. With the chain Gustav controls Serena physically and symbolically Ã¢â‚¬â€œ a sign that she is under his power.

As their passionate relationship intensifies, GustavÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s hold on the silver chain grows stronger. But will GustavÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s dark past tear them apart?

The Golden Locket (The Unbreakable Trilogy #2)

Temptation would test themÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

The second novel in the Unbreakable Trilogy, The Golden Locket follows Gustav and Serena to New York.

Ensconced in their Manhattan penthouse, all seems blissfully happy for Gustav and Serena. Still in the first flush of love, they have every satisfaction they could need.

But as they enjoy their New York pleasure ground, ghosts start to emerge from GustavÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s past, and when his damaged younger brother, Pierre, comes back into his life, he brings with him a dangerous threatÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

With temptation waiting at every turn, can Gustav and Serena survive all the excitement that the Big Apple holds?
